text: Chennai, India Full-time developers. http://www.ivivacloud.com Help us build our SAAS Smart Workplace Solution. Our software typically integrates with real-time subsystems in buildings (think lighting systems, security systems, AHUs, CCTVs etc...) which we monitor and control as part of what we do. We need a full-stack developer. We have interesting problems to solve. Mail me at <haran at ecyber.com>
